title: A combination of gliclazide and metformin attenuates obesity-induced polycystic ovary syndrome in female Wistar rats
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Anam Moazzam, Ammara Saleem, Shahid Shah, Liaqat Hussain, Mirza Muhammad Faran Ashraf Baig, Abdulrahman Alshammari, Norah A. Albekairi, Muhammad Furqan Akhtar
